title.narrative: Supporting and caring for orphans in Afghanistan

description.narrative: - Providing school uniforms, bags and stationery for orphans for 896 orphans - Securing foodstuffs to live in two schools for a year - Distribution of food baskets for teachers and workers in ten seminar orphanages belonging to the symposium to 184 teachers and employees. Maintenance of the buildings of the three schools of the symposium

- The number of 896 orphans and orphans obtaining a school uniform, a school bag and stationery. - Improving the living conditions of orphans and workers in my school. 184 teachers and staff members get food baskets due to their urgent need. - Improving the educational environment for the symposium's three orphanages in Afghanistan
Supporting and caring for orphans in Afghanistan because of the attention the Kingdom and people give to orphans in all affected countries
